free_text.Prérequis: Interest for genomics and mathematical approach of genetic data - the biology is intended to be accessible to mathematicians, and the math accessible to life sciences and technology students.

free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: This course will introduce students to the basics of statistical analysis as applied to genomic data, as well as provide an in depth application by focusing upon current topics in population genetics and molecular evolution.
